bike.description: A1 Premium Aluminum, Ground Control geometry 700c comfort frame, formed tubes w/ integrated kick stand mount, forged drop outs and replaceable 98954020 alloy derailleur hanger

Tektro alloy 4 finger lever, Kraton contact area, for rapid fire shifter
KMC X8, 1/2" x 3/32" w/ reusable Missing Link
Shimano FC-TX71, square taper w/ c'ring guard
TH cartridge, square taper, 68 x 122.5mm for 47.5mm chain line
Specialized/Alex Globe, 700c, 32h, double wall w/ machine sidewalls and eyelets
Specialized, forged alloy, 32h, polished races, steel QR
Alloy suspension, 27.2mm, two bolt head w/ preload adjust
Chain stay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual, rack mount extensions
SR NEX-4010-700, 63mm, Hi-Ten stanchions and steerer, preload adj. w/ spring assisted seal
Specialized Ground Control, four bolt, alloy 1 1/8 quill
Body Geometry Comfort, dual density gel, integrated bell
